data.name: Set1Text
data.value: Grupo 1

data.name: Set2Text
data.value: Set 2

data.name: Set3Text
data.value: Set 3

data.name: Question01Text
data.value: Given the choice of anyone in the world, whom would you want as a dinner guest?

data.name: Question02Text
data.value: Would you like to be famous? In what way?

data.name: Question03Text
data.value: Before making a telephone call, do you ever rehearse what you are going to say? Why?

data.name: Question04Text
data.value: What could constitute "perfect" day for you?

data.name: Question05Text
data.value: When did you last sing to yourself? To someone else?

data.name: Question06Text
data.value: If you were able to live to the age of 90 and retain either the mind or body of a 30 year old for the last 60 years of your life, which would you want?

data.name: Question07Text
data.value: Do you have a secret hunch about how you will die?

data.name: Question08Text
data.value: Name three things you and your partner appear to have in common.

data.name: Question09Text
data.value: For what in your life do you feel most grateful?

data.name: Question10Text
data.value: If you could change anything about the way you were raised, what would it be?

data.name: Question11Text
data.value: Take four minutes and tell your partner your life story in as much detail as possible.

data.name: Question12Text
data.value: If you could wake up tomorrow having gained any one quality or ability, what would it be?

data.name: Question13Text
data.value: If a crystal ball could tell you the truth about yourself, your life, the future or anything else, what would you want to know?

data.name: Question14Text
data.value: Is there something that you’ve dreamed of doing for a long time? Why haven’t you done it?

data.name: Question15Text
data.value: What is the greatest accomplishment of your life?

data.name: Question16Text
data.value: What do you value most in a friendship?

data.name: Question17Text
data.value: What is your most treasured memory?

data.name: Question18Text
data.value: What is your most terrible memory?

data.name: Question19Text
data.value: If you knew that in one year you would die suddenly, would you change anything about the way you are now living? Why?

data.name: Question20Text
data.value: What does friendship mean to you?

data.name: Question21Text
data.value: What roles do love and affection play in your life?

data.name: Question22Text
data.value: Alternate sharing something you consider a positive characteristic of your partner. Share a total of five items.

data.name: Question23Text
data.value: How close and warm is your family? Do you feel your childhood was happier than most other people’s?

data.name: Question24Text
data.value: How do you feel about your relationship with your mother?

data.name: Question25Text
data.value: Make three true “we” statements each. For instance, “We are both in this room feeling ... “

data.name: Question26Text
data.value: Complete this sentence: “I wish I had someone with whom I could share ... “

data.name: Question27Text
data.value: If you were going to become a close friend with your partner, please share what would be important for him or her to know.

data.name: Question28Text
data.value: Tell your partner what you like about them; be very honest this time, saying things that you might not say to someone you’ve just met.

data.name: Question29Text
data.value: Share with your partner an embarrassing moment in your life.

data.name: Question30Text
data.value: When did you last cry in front of another person? By yourself?

data.name: Question31Text
data.value: Tell your partner something that you like about them already.

data.name: Question32Text
data.value: What, if anything, is too serious to be joked about?

data.name: Question33Text
data.value: If you were to die this evening with no opportunity to communicate with anyone, what would you most regret not having told someone? Why haven’t you told them yet?

data.name: Question34Text
data.value: Your house, containing everything you own, catches fire. After saving your loved ones and pets, you have time to safely make a final dash to save any one item. What would it be? Why?

data.name: Question35Text
data.value: Of all the people in your family, whose death would you find most disturbing? Why?

data.name: Question36Text
data.value: Share a personal problem and ask your partner’s advice on how he or she might handle it. Also, ask your partner to reflect back to you how you seem to be feeling about the problem you have chosen.
